description.brief: Camera Pan/Tilt controller for the Wubble Robot

package.description: A driver plugin to the ax12_driver_core manager.py node. Controls the camera (aka, head) of the Wubble Robot. Two Dynamixel AX-12+ servos (pan and tilt joints) can be controlled with a pan and tilt angle in integer degrees.
package.author: UA Robotics Research Group
